channel.title: "Can't Load/Download (said) Cache" 317 Server

item.title: "Can't Load/Download (said) Cache" 317 Server
item.dc:creator: @Flipp Flipp
item.description:
@Flipp wrote:

Okay soo I have my webclient up for my server ‘FlippScape’, and everything else set up for my server to run just fine, but, whenever someone tries to load the client, it sends the message “Error: Can’t Load/Download FlippScapeCache” Even if they have the Cache already in their C:\ Drive extracted and all…

Yes, I have changed the Cache name, and i’m sure that’s where the problem begins.

If anyone can point me to the files in the cache where I can change the Downloading and Extracting?

I have the download link in the CacheDownloader file, but is there something else I need to change for the file to load or Extract right?

public class CacheDownloader { 
private client client;

private final int BUFFER = 1024;

private final int VERSION = 5;
private String cacheLink = "https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/rmaguum1g7y4v1n/FlippScapeCache.zip";

private String fileToExtract = getCacheDir() + getArchivedName();

public CacheDownloader(client client) {
	this.client = client;
}</blockquote>

** I HAVE CHANGED WHAT CACHE THE CLIENT LOADS AS WELL **

Read full topic
